bio: The woods are lovely, dark and deep. But I have promises to keep, and miles to go before I sleep. -Robert Frost
The only thing we have to fear, is fear itself. -President Dwight D. Eisenhower
'If you can't handle me at my worst, you don't deserve me at my best. -Abraham Lincoln' -Bob Hinkley
If you chase two rabbits, both will get away. -Confuscius
